definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
variant of 晰[xi1]/variant of 皙|晰[xi1]

sentences.english: Then he sat down next to Voisin and began to write, carefully, without hurry, a thin legible hand.
sentences.chinese: 他不慌不忙，认认真真地写下一串纤细而清晰的字迹。

sentences.english: Specifically, the clarity and projection of the altissimo range.
sentences.chinese: 具体地说，可以影响高音区发音的清晰度和穿透力吗？

sentences.english: I heard Heidi breathe deeply, but she said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我听见了海蒂清晰的呼吸声，但她什么也没有说。

sentences.english: Three visualisations of nuclear combustion in a supernova.
sentences.chinese: 超新星内核燃烧的三种清晰呈像。

sentences.english: Cameron has supervised the creation of a new high-definition transfer for the DVD.
sentences.chinese: 喀麦隆指导了这部DVD的全新高清晰数码转换。

sentences.english: Read the word clearly and don't swallow a syllable.
sentences.chinese: 把单词读清晰，不要吞掉音节。

sentences.english: In the guise of a fiction, the truth about himself is articulated.
sentences.chinese: 在虚幻的伪装下，他自我的真相得到了清晰的表达。

sentences.english: The enhanced speech signals of the proposed algorithm have better clearness and intelligibility besides higher output SNR.
sentences.chinese: 增强后的语音具有更好的可懂度和清晰度。

sentences.english: The property right need to be very clearly and blench of the pawn of bank.
sentences.chinese: 房产产权清晰，尽量回避银行抵押物业。

sentences.english: He has struck off a good description of the scene.
sentences.chinese: 他已把该场景清晰流畅地描述出来了。

sentences.english: Image-wise, it still lacks a clear identity.
sentences.chinese: 品牌认知方面，它仍然缺乏清晰的定义。

sentences.english: Petal clear ZhenTianLei is a northeast pure the yes, this sentence is equivalent to shock him.
sentences.chinese: 瓣儿清晰震天雷是个东北纯爷们，这句话相当于激他。

sentences.english: A regular system (of number-words) also makes arithmetic clearer to understand.
sentences.chinese: 数字的规律系统也让算术更加清晰易懂。

sentences.english: The depth it reaches before disappearing gives a measure of water clarity.
sentences.chinese: 它在达到消失的深度之前，可以测量出水的清晰度。

sentences.english: Typical applications include stream processing of high resolution images for deployed airborne surveillance.
sentences.chinese: 其典型应用包括空中监视高清晰度图像的流处理。

sentences.english: But signs of renewal are evident throughout the city.
sentences.chinese: 但全市恢复活力的新面貌已清晰可见。

definition: clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear/also written 明瞭|明了[ming2 liao3]
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
